LanguageData.VHGE_CommandToggleGas_Desc: Designate gas flow to be toggle on or off. A colonist will come soon to flick the switch.
LanguageData.VHGE_InfiniteDeposit: A small infinite helixien gas deposit has been found!
LanguageData.VHGE_GasOverlayTooltip: Toggle the infinite gas pocket overlay
LanguageData.VHGE_NeedDeepOrGeyser: Helixien pump need to be placed on helixien deep pocket or gas geyser.
LanguageData.VHGE_FillGeyserDesc: Allow removing the geyser from the map. Not reversible.
